title: Sample, mid-20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, bast
Technique: plain weave with single and grouped wefts
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 29.5 x 45.1 cm (11 5/8 x 17 3/4 in.)
description: Uneven vertical stripe of black and tan.  The warp is of black cotton and heavy undyed bast fiber.  The black cotton wefts are interlaced singly with the black warp, but interlaced in pairs with the natural warp. The effect is of bands of dense black alternating with stripes of speckled black and tan.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, mid-20th century.
mid-20th century. Medium: cotton, bast
Technique: plain weave with single and grouped wefts. Gift of Anni Albers. 1953-208-2.
